No one fucks the loser harder then Vendetta. If you lose your getting brutally fucked. Fucked in the mouth, fucked in the pussy, fucked in the ass, then fucked one more time for good time sake. Being fucked by Vendetta is like being in a war, you just hope you survive it...
title: Vendetta (3-0)
